channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- OPC Factory Server (OFS)

item.title: CVE-2023-2161|2024-08-02T06:12:20.577Z -- schneider%20electric -- opc%20factory%20server%20%28ofs%29
item.description: A CWE-611: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized read access to the file system when a malicious configuration file is loaded on to the software by a local user.Â
